fields.name: Id
fields.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

fields.name: Location
fields.description: The geographic location of the resource. This must be one of the supported and registered Azure geo regions (for example, West US, East US, Southeast Asia, and so forth). This property is required when creating a new resource.

fields.name: Sku
fields.description: The SKU of the search service, which determines the billing rate and capacity limits. This property is required when creating a new search service.

fields.name: Tags
fields.description: Tags to help categorize the resource in the Azure portal.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"
